name: Moontale
description:
Moontale is a demo from a game in development. It doesn't have all the functionalities that the complete version will have, as it is an arcade game, the objective is to keep yourself alive dodging the balloons. There are minor visual bugs with the parallax background.

The complete version will include also an history to introduce the gameplay, more obstacles and additional features.

Btw, her name is Lui. (her complete name is Louisa)
